Flow.description: 2024 Version - This simplifies the signup , the volunteer will be sent to the vol coordinator for next steps and eventually be sent to register in the community

formulas.name: CalcAge
formulas.expression: IF( NOT( ISBLANK( {!DOB} ) ) , IF( DATE( 2000 , MONTH( {!DOB} ) , DAY( {!DOB} ) ) <= DATE( 2000 , MONTH( TODAY() ) , DAY( TODAY() ) ), YEAR (Today()) - YEAR ( {!DOB} ), YEAR (Today()) - YEAR ( {!DOB} ) -1 ), null)

Flow.label: volunteer registration

fields.name: CompletedMsg
fields.fieldText: Thank you for completing your We Can Ride Volunteer application!

fields.name: GoverningLawTXT
fields.fieldText:
BY SIGNING THIS RELEASE, I EXPRESSLY STATE THAT I HAVE READ AND UNDERSTAND ITS TERMS AND THAT I HAVE GIVEN UP SUBSTANTIAL RIGHTS AND THAT I INDICATE MY INTENT TO ENTER INTO THIS RELEASE KNOWINGLY AND VOLUNTARILY.

 

IF SIGNING AS PARENT/GUARDIAN, BY SIGNING THIS RELEASE, I CERTIFY THAT I AM THE PARENT OR LEGAL GUARDIAN OF THE PARTICIPANT, THAT I HAVE LEGAL AUTHORITY OVER PARTICIPANT, THAT I HAVE READ AND UNDERSTAND THE TERMS OF THIS RELEASE, AND THAT I FREELY SIGN THIS RELEASE AND WILL ABIDE BY ITS TERMS FOR MYSELF AND ON BEHALF OF THE PARTICIPANT.

fields.name: DispTextBeforeEmail
fields.fieldText:
Your email address is currently on file, we have sent you an email to ({!SendEmailAddress}).


If you have not completed your onboarding contact angelm@wecanride.org

fields.name: EmployerInfo
fields.fieldText:
EMPLOYMENT INFORMATION


This helps us with grants and tracking employer-matching gift programs.

fields.name: Error
fields.fieldText:
There is an error with your registration, please contact angelm@wecanride.com to complete your registration.


VolInfo Error


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: MinorNotice
fields.fieldText: Thank you for being so interested. Unfortunately, you must be at least 14 to volunteer with We Can Ride.

fields.name: ParentGuardianInfo
fields.fieldText: Anyone between 14-18 will need to enter a Parent or Guardian information.

validationRule.errorMessage: Please type a valid email address.

fields.name: SkillSec1
fields.fieldText: Other Languages

fields.name: SkillsSec2
fields.fieldText:
Abilities
Volunteering in class with We Can Ride can sometimes be very physically and emotionally demanding.

fields.name: WalkWeightButtons
fields.fieldText: Can you walk for 60 minutes without fatiguing; jog for a short distance; & hold your arm above shoulder height?

fields.name: SkillSec3
fields.fieldText:
Interests
Note: We will contact you about training prior to starting. Also, you must participate in at least one session as a sidewalker before becoming a leader or barn aide.

fields.name: SkillsSec4
fields.fieldText:
Sidewalkers- work with the client by walking alongside the horse during class. They help the client understand the instructor’s directions, achieve balance, independence, and reach personal goals.
Feeder- Help feed our herd one day a week. Feeders get trained by the Barn Manager and are placed with 1-2 other feeders.
Leader- Lead the horse in lessons making sure the horse is safe & well behaved. Arrive at least 20 minutes early to warm up the horse. Attend and successfully pass leader training to become a leader.
Barn Aide- Catch, groom, tack, untack and release the horses after lessons. Arrive at least an hour early to get horses ready. Must already be trained as a leader and been a leader in one session. Attend and successfully pass barn aide training. You will then shadow the barn aides on the day you volunteer for one session for more training.
Events, Office Tasks, Committees- No training needed to help.

screens.name: Volunteer_Main_Info
screens.label: We Can Ride New Volunteer Registration

validationRule.errorMessage: You can only type names with less than 40 characters

fields.name: noteScreen1
fields.fieldText: Note: You will still receive volunteer updates and correspondence by email.

fields.name: How_did_you_hear_about_us
fields.fieldText: How did you hear about us?

fields.name: Previous_horse_experience
fields.fieldText: Do you have previous horse experience?

fields.name: walkliftwarningText
fields.fieldText:
You seem to be unable to meet one of the minimum requirements to volunteer in class or feed.


However, we would welcome you volunteering in other ways (office, events). If you'd like to do these, please click Previous to edit your entry. Or click Finish to cancel your registration.

fields.name: WelcomeMsg
fields.fieldText: Welcome! Please complete the online registration to Volunteer with We Can Ride.

textTemplates.name: emailBody
textTemplates.text:
You have a volunteer record with We Can Ride.

If you have not completed your initial training, please contact angelm@wecanride.org for the next steps.

textTemplates.name: emailnotification
textTemplates.text:
Be advised that there is a new volunteer form completed on line

to see details go to
